General.Name: Beijing Haitian Ruisheng Science Technology Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Haitian Ruisheng Science Technology Ltd. operates as an AI data resource company in China and internationally. It provides engineering data products and services to enterprises and scientific research institutions. The company also offers its products in various domains, such as speech recognition, speech synthesis, computer vision, lexicon, and natural language processing, as well as related services for the design, collection, transcription, annotation, etc. It serves technology internet, social networking, IoT, and smart driving industries; educational and scientific research institutions; smart gold mainstream enterprises in finance and other fields; and government and enterprise institutions. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Siyao  Lu
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
